EmailTemplate.name: Backorder - Giovanni Mediati - EN.Backorder Giovani Mediati EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Disinfecting Wipes Remain on Backorder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Thank you for your patience, but due to the on-going supply shortage, your order of disinfecting wipes remains on backorder. Even though pre-moistened disinfecting wipes are currently unavailable, we do have alternative products such as sprays and wipers that are in stock, and when paired together, meet or exceed the power of a wipe.
Here are a couple of disinfecting sprays that I highly recommend:
- zytec Germ Buster Disinfectant Trigger Spray <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/1264-0_zytec_Germ_Buster_Disinfectant_Trigger_Spray_Bottle%2c_946_mL.aspx?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERGIOVANNIEN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
- Highmark All Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/98918_Highmark_All_Purpose_Disinfectant_Cleaner%2c_Ready-to-Use_Spray%2c_740_mL.aspx?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERGIOVANNIEN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - this is a great cleaner for everyday maintenance
For ease of use, I suggest pairing these sprays with wipers as they have superior strength, durability, and absorbency compared to using a regular paper towel. Here are a couple I recommend:
- EasyTask Centerfeed Spunlace Wipers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/N-A105CZGW_EasyTask_Centerfeed_Spunlace_Wipers_with_GrabBox%2c_White%2c_275_SheetsRL.aspx?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERGIOVANNIEN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
- Cascades Pro Tuff All Purpose Paper Wipers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/CAS-W100_Cascades_PRO_Tuff-Job_2-Ply_14_Fold_All-Purpose_Paper_Wipers%2c_Brown%2c_800_WipersCT.aspx?mode=direct&?cmp=EBNIAMBACKORDERGIOVANNIEN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you.
Best Regards,
Giovanni Mediati National Inside Account Manager Gestionaire a l'interne des comptes Nationaux
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: GiovanniMediati@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:GiovanniMediati@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44044

Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail. AVIS DE CONFIDENTIALITÉ : Le contenu de ce courriel (et de ses documents joints, s’il y a lieu) est protégé et confidentiel. Il n’est destiné qu’au destinataire ou aux destinataires indiqué(s) ci-dessus. Il est strictement interdit, pour toute autre personne, de le divulguer, le communiquer ou le reproduire. Si vous avez reçu cet envoi par erreur, veuillez le détruire et nous en aviser immédiatement par courriel.
